text: ${player} and ${player}, which one of you said 'I love you' first? The other person takes 2 sips.
${player}, name three qualities of ${player}. For each one the group approves, your partner takes 1 sip.
All couples: the person who takes the longest to get ready in the morning takes 2 sips.
${player} and ${player}, make each other drink. If either of you spills, both take 2 additional sips.
${player}, what was your first impression of ${player}? If it wasn't positive, take 3 sips.
Couples game: ${player} and ${player}, count to three then point to who apologizes first after a fight.
${player}, if you could change one habit of ${player}, what would it be? Your partner drinks if they agree.
All couples: the most jealous person in the relationship takes 2 sips.
${player} and ${player}, take turns naming things that annoy you about each other. First to run out of ideas takes 3 sips.
${player}, what's the most embarrassing moment of ${player} that you witnessed? They take 2 sips.
Couples game: the person who made the first move takes 2 sips.
${player}, do your best impression of ${player}. The group rates it 1 to 10; below 5, you drink that many sips.
All couples: the more forgetful partner takes 2 sips. If there's disagreement, the group votes.
${player}, name ${player}'s guilty pleasure. If correct, your partner takes 2 sips. If wrong, you take 3.
Couples swap phones for 30 seconds. Each person can open one app of their choice on their partner's phone.
${player}, what's the most romantic thing ${player} has done for you? If everyone finds it cute, your partner distributes 3 sips.
All couples: the better cook in the relationship distributes 3 sips. If there's disagreement, the group votes.
${player}, tell us about your worst date with ${player}. They take 2 sips afterward.
Couples game: the partner most likely to check their phone during dinner takes 2 sips.
${player} and ${player}, rate your first kiss out of 10. If scores differ by more than 2 points, you both drink the difference.
All couples: the partner who spends the most on useless things takes 2 sips.
${player}, what does ${player} think is your most annoying habit? If you guess wrong, take 3 sips.
Couples game: on three, point to who said 'I love you' first. Couples who disagree both take 2 sips.
${player}, what would be ${player}'s ideal date night? Your partner drinks if you're right.
All couples: the partner who spends the most time in the bathroom takes 2 sips.
${player}, what song reminds you most of ${player}? If they don't know the song, you take 2 sips.
Couples game: the more stubborn partner takes 3 sips. If there's disagreement, the group votes.
${player} and ${player}, give each other a compliment. The group votes for the most sincere; loser takes 2 sips.
All couples: the partner most likely to fall asleep during a movie takes 2 sips.
${player}, what's the weirdest gift ${player} has given you? If it was actually thoughtful, distribute 3 sips.
